verses.name: Numbers 16:29
verses.text: If these men die the common death of all men, or if they be visited after the visitation of all men; then the Lord hath not sent me.

verses.name: Numbers 16:30
verses.text: But if the Lord make a new thing, and the earth open her mouth, and swallow them up, with all that appertain unto them, and they go down quick into the pit; then ye shall understand that these men have provoked the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 16:31
verses.text: And it came to pass, as he had made an end of speaking all these words, that the ground clave asunder that was under them:
